original_text: They tied Jesus' hands and feet and then they took him to Pilate's house. They put him under the authority of Pilate, who was the Roman ruler.
korean_text: 결박하여 끌고 가서 총독 빌라도에게 넘겨 주니라

sentences.original_text: They tied Jesus' hands and feet
and then they took him to Pilate's house
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 그를 빌라도의 집으로 데려갔다

sentences.original_text: They put him under the authority of Pilate
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그를 빌라도의 권위 아래 두었다
